active.description: Flag indicating if the user field is currently active or not.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the user field was created.

description.description: Detailed description of the user field.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user field.

key.description: Unique key associated with the user field.

position.description: Position index of the user field in the user profile.

raw_description.description: Raw HTML content for the user field description.

raw_title.description: Raw HTML content for the user field title.

regexp_for_validation.description: Regular expression for validating the user field value.

system.description: Flag indicating if the user field is a system default field or a custom field.

tag.description: Tag associated with the user field for categorization.

title.description: Title or name of the user field.

type.description: Data type of the user field value.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the user field was last updated.

url.description: URL pointing to the user field's endpoint for detailed information.
